ygData.subject: Re: Alcohol Tolerance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe it s supposed to let you get the bonuses (increased STR and STA) without, or with lower, the negatives (lowered INT and WIS). ... Dave s World
ygData.messageBody:
--- slu@... wrote:
> In the vein of discussing mystery skills; how the
> devil does alcohol tolerance work?

I believe it's supposed to let you get the bonuses
(increased STR and STA) without, or with lower, the
negatives (lowered INT and WIS).

===
:D
